title: S7E09 – "Modern Dread" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you six spine-chilling tales from author David Feuling, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about cryptic containers, psychic seekers, nightmarish nature, creepy cards, and so much more!
